评论概述: I like it! Really cute harness
评论详情: I really like this harness that I got. It’s not real leather of course but still looks nice on and isn’t very cheap looking. Everything is adjustable. I was intimidated at first to figure out how to put it on, but once I located the front and back, you basically put it on like a vest and then wrap the sides around and secure. Each part can be adjusted and it also has little sliders to hold down any extra material so it doesn’t stick out. I would wear this with a cute festival outfit or dress (not what I’m wearing in the photo), but I just love the look of it!
I love the adjustable-ness of this harness. The only reason why I didn't give it a five star is the leather is really cheap but it still looks nice.

The con is that this is a very cheap piece, to the point that even the very little amount of money I paid for it feels like too much for the poor quality. It's likely not going to hold up for more than a few wears, and I wouldn't dare to clip or hang anything from it.  The pros are that it looks exactly how I hoped it would and will absolutely work for the event I bought it for. It's extremely adjustable, and I think folks of a lot of sizes would be able to wear this comfortably. It also weighs nothing and is comfy enough, so if I wanted to wear it with a sleeveless/backless shirt or a crop top in warm weather I wouldn't worry about it irritating or leaving indentations on bare skin.  Overall this product is fine. Poor quality, but it looks good.

I was really looking forward to this harness. I purchased design 2. I am not overweight but I do have curvy hips and a fuller bust. I am thick but I was expecting this to at least wrap around my waist but it did not. I had to add 2 belt extenders to make it fit. I suppose you have to be an American size 0-6 for this to fit properly. I’m a size 10-12. The material is also a bit cheap and it seems to be stapled? It’s also a bit confusing to figure out and it came thrown in a plastic bag all tangled. If you’re anything like me and are interested in the same belt design, I’d suggest looking for a “plus size” harness.

评论概述: It does what it's supposed to do, but you get what you pay for
评论详情: This came with one shoulder strap fed backwards, so I had to undo it and feed it through correctly. That doesn't sound like much, but let me tell you...it was a whole process. It looked great when I had it correct, but it should have come ready to wear. Because it's totally adjustable, things were sliding when I was attempting to fix it.  Once on, it looked cute, but the ends kept popping out and sticking up. It isn't structured to hold a shape, so it sat on me rather than gave any support and wasn't flattering. Luckily, I got this to wear one night for a concert, but I had hoped I could use it again... it just isn't made for that. If you're looking at this for more wear than a costume or event, pass on it and buy something better made. If this is just for a one time wear, you can't beat the price.
Nice one, but if you are curvy, it might not fit well in the circumference

it is good quality and isn’t uncomfortable

It was a little confusing figuring out how to put it on at first, but I figured it out quickly. I’m 5’4, 125 lbs and the bottom straps had way too much excess strap. I cut it with scissors and tucked it under the belt strap & it still looks cute! I love it!
Easy to put on and adjust, price was right for this belt and I received a ton of compliments.

I've had this for a hot minute now and have worn it a TON more than I thought I would! It holds up super well to moderate use and is a go to when I feel like my outfits are missing something. I like how it can add a bit of that edgy vibe to even the simplest outfits. My favorite way to style this is over a simple white, fitted button up with some trousers or jeans for work. Fit wise, I'm a 34C bust, 26" waist and I have to have this on the tightest setting. That means I have a lot of flappy bits towards the end so I have to tie them down, which can be a bit annoying. Like I said, this holds up well and has become a wardrobe staple but I will upgrade to a nicer, real leather version that fits me better when it's time to replace this one. I still think this is an awesome economical option that will last a decent amount of time and would definitely recommend it if you're considering!

It's a very versatile item that I just added to my wardrobe. I have a lot of baggy dresses that just need some shaping and this does the trick. I think it goes nice with girly outfits to kind of tone it down, or with rocker chick outfits too because it looks so baddie. I'm very happy with this

I like the direction this was going in, the straps are a bit long and the bands you slide them through are loose so they droop or slide back out. Could be my size, I’m a little over 5’3 and 115lbs. Quality of the material is cool but I don’t think I would order this again.

I’m so glad I took a chance on this item. I love the way these fashion harnesses look and I’ve been wanting to try one out. I loved the crossover look at the waistline so I choose this look and love it. Good quality too.
great value, perfect for costumes
The quality is very nice. The buckles and straps feel very durable and it looks really nice. It has buckled in the right places so it downs t feel uncomfortable at all.
Not very sturdy , dosnt feel well made .

I bought this as a part for a Halloween costume. It’s a cool harness. The adjustability makes it so it could fit a lot of different sides. Might try to make it work for a few edgy outfits or just add to my ever-growing Halloween costume collection.

评论概述: A top tier fashion accessory that's cruelty-free, versatile, and exudes attitude!
评论详情: Widyany's chest harness with belt closures is a must-have accessory for fashion enthusiasts looking to add a touch of punk and gothic flair to their outfits. Made from vegan-friendly faux leather, this black harness belt is both stylish and eco-conscious. With its buckle closure and adjustable waist belts, it offers customizable comfort and a perfect fit for anyone. Whether you're layering it over dresses or using it to create edgy punk looks, this belt is versatile and fashion-forward. The patent leather shininess adds a touch of sophistication, making it suitable for both elegant and gothic styles. It's an excellent investment for those seeking a statement piece that won't break the bank, as it offers great value for money.  10/10 Its a top choice that's sure to elevate any outfit; especially because you can layer it over everything and anything! It's great for multiple looks, or bare skin!

I would admit I am not thin at all. Probably a size large or extra large. And I actually put this on last night. And it fits well but definitely snug. The buckles are good quality & the material is thicker than expected which is a good thing!
Love this … it makes my ordinary white t-shirt so unique and chic, with a little punk style. Wouldn’t say material is the greatest quality, but I like it, it’s really fun.
I love this! It’s so sexy! Easy to put on!

评论概述: Sexy and adds an edgy detail to your outfit
评论详情: I love harnesses and this one is thin and sleek enough to dress up a plain outfit to give it an edgier vibe. It’s not the greatest quality - it’s PVC, but if you’re only wearing it a few times when you go out, it should hold up for a while. I like how it fits and adjusts easily.

It was a fun accessory to add to my outfit for going out at night that my husband also enjoyed being left on after we got home when the rest came off. The straps were comfortable and pretty adjustable and have held up well despite being pulled on quite a bit.

This harness is comfortable and relatively easy to put on. It's super cute and is a fun accessory to dress up a ton of different outfits - my only complaint is that the material feels cheap, so I'm slightly worried about how long this will actually hold up.

I love this punk belt/harness. I wish I had this back in my goth days. This would've been perfect. I'm trying new styles and going back to my roots. I forgot how gothic I was and wanted to be. 评论概述: Good for quick and easy costume!
评论详情: This is a quick, easy, and cheap way to get a decent looking belt/harness for a costume.  It's not real leather, so not going to hold up for years, but great for Halloween!!

评论概述: One size does not fit all.
评论详情: Sometimes, "one size fits all" simply doesn't.  I struggled to buckle these straps, having to make them quite tight and using the very last hole.  So, if you're 44" or larger around the middle, skip this one entirely.  Beyond that, the shoulder straps were plenty long enough (almost too long for my short frame), and the buckles were completely serviceable.
I’m so excited to use it for my Burning Man outfit! I really liked the quality and the look. Adjustable straps makes it very comfortable. Highly recommended :)

评论概述: Needed to adjust for petite sizes but a great product regardless
评论详情: I'm a petite, 100lb woman and this harness was waaayyy too big. The good news is that the material was easy to do alterations on. The straps are pretty good quality PU leather with sealed edges, so even though I made new belt holes and trimmed the length I am sure it will last well. The rings and buckles are also sturdy and put together well, so it was very much worth the price even though I had to change it to fit better.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for
评论详情: I have been looking for a harness belt for a while now. The Widyany Punk Belt is exactly what I've been looking for. I am always a little hesitant when clothing and accessory items are one size fits all but this harness belt fits me perfectly. It had enough belt holes for me to tighten sufficiently. It looks and feels great on and it appears to be of good quality. I would order again.

I’m just over 5 foot and wear a small to medium top. With this harness, I was on the lowest holes and could not get a good fit. There was so much extra that it all looked bad. This would likely fit someone bigger better, but for me it doesn’t work despite the adjustability.
I opened the package and was slapped in the face with the smell of chemicals. It’s a cute harness but I’m not sure I can get over the stench.

I got this for a costume and I think that for that it works fine. The straps are too thin but they work, the material is just ok. I don't think it will last long, but for the price it's fine.

(Item: Widyany Punk Belt Black Pu Leather Belt, Harness Belt for Women Gothic Body Adjustable Waist Belts Dresses Party Accessories)  Visually it looks good from a distance (close up, you can see the imperfections). Fairly sexy on. Good for goth or cosplay or photoshoots. You have to cut the straps after sizing. They're pretty long.  On the downside, it's very cheaply made. Not even good fake leather. Feels more like plastic. The kind of material you get when you buy an inexpensive halloween costume kit. Instead of $16 (price at the time the review), this should maybe sell for $9-$11 at the most. If you just need it for 1-2 wears, this will work. Otherwise, hard item to recommend.
It’s very cute and easy to put on, looks cool. Just larger than I thought it would end up being

This punk-inspired harness is the perfect addition to any high neck or bodycon dress or jumpsuit. It was easily assembled (just unpack and buckle) and the straps were easily adjustable. Great value for this belt that doubles as a harness and all-around cool accessory for this season!

评论概述: This looks and fits exactly as the pictures show.
评论详情: The O-rings are solid, and the clasps work great. Stays adjusted once fit on. Easy to adjust to size. The straps seem like solid lengths of material, strong with no real stretch. The grommets are secured in place. Appears well made and fits really well. The only thing I don’t like are the loops to hold the excess of the strap to the harness, they are secured closed with a type of metal staple that has a tendency to spin to the front and show. It looks a bit odd when it does this.
Very nice I love this corset belt it’s beautiful yet stylish, can wear with any top to accessorize Fits as expected can adjust belt size Love it

评论概述: Give yourself time to put it on
评论详情: This harness is cute, but not perfect. It's hard to adjust it to look right, and the ends of the straps stick way out, no matter how I try to adjust it. Since the horizontal straps can slide back and forth through the slots in the vertical straps, you can sort of slide them so that the buckles are in the middle once you close them. But I found that it takes a while to get the harness to look right, so definitely give yourself enough time to put it on before you need to be wherever you're wearing it to. Overall, it's a cute harness, but I can't make it look like the product description, even after adjusting it for like ten minutes straight. But even though it's not perfect, I'll still be able to wear it to certain events.

At first, this belt was a bit confusing to adjust.  But setting it up, it was a breeze to put on.  The leather straps are reasonably thick and durable.  Overall, this is a very fashionable accessory that will complement any wardrobe.
Took me a minute to figure it out but once I did, I loved it! Definitely not super curvy friendly but I was able to make it work

It's cute but it's a headache to put on!  I'll be excited to wear it on another day when I have more time to mess with all the straps. No weird smells when I opened the bag. The material is thin and lightweight
It’s not for smaller women, I’m usually a medium top and tightened it to the max and it’s still loose around the shoulders and you can’t adjust that part. Sadly have to return

You get what you paid for. It’s very thin and cheap looking, the straps are super long with no space to tuck them in. But it’s a cute addition to an outfit, probably not the best to move around as it did break

This is a fun fashion belt. If you're not familiar with wearing these types of belts, it may be intimidating figuring out what buckles where. I would refer to the image and you should be good. It's very light and thin faux leather. Fits nicely and is adjustable. I'm pleased.

评论概述: It came missing a critical piece :'(
评论详情: This should be made up of six distinct pieces. the three that go around the body, the one that comes up from the back and splits, and the two that the ends buckle into. Unless I am hugely misunderstanding the design, there is a piece missing. One of the buckle pieces was nowhere to be found, rendering this un-usable.
It doesn't give any size but essentially says it's a one size fits all, which is very untrue. If you're not super tiny, it won't fit you.

评论概述: Not exactly like the picture but it works.
评论详情: I am 5’7”, about 170 lbs, and my waist is 30”.  I got this to act like suspenders. I am able to remove as many belts as I like to get the look I want. The  three belts have more than enough extra over hang that I can tuck the ends into the shoulder strap connector. The shoulder straps too have plenty of holes for adjusting but I felt could have been longer for people with longer torsos.The quality is ok, not the best and the picture shows thicker straps and belts. These are on the thinner side. Not bad for the price.
This belt looks really good with all fitted shirts or none! it makes my style look grungy which I love. Would make a good accessory for cosplay idea.
A little confusing to put on for the first time but very cute. Doesn’t look expensive but doesn’t look as cheap as I was expecting
As most harnesses are this one was a pain to figure out how to properly put on. After a few minutes of struggling with that I figured it out and was able to put it on

Harnesses can be pretty hit or miss, depending on your proportions. This one is pretty adjustable and comfortable. It's not real leather and very lightweight. It layers well over clothing, less so underneath. The design allows both shoulder straps and all the rib straps to be adjusted as much as is needed. The straps are also pretty darn long. I ended up clipping the ends off the rib straps, since I had so much left hanging. Very comfortable once sized to fit my body!

I was not sure this would fit me since I'm more on the plus size and curvy with almost a DDD cup, but it fit perfectly. It is very easy to put on and even though the material is not exactly as pictured it still looks like good quality.
